sections.text: An individual may obtain a permit to carry a concealed handgun in accordance with the Concealed Handgun Permit Act.SourceLaws 2006, LB 454, ยง 2.

69-2428.Permit to carry concealed handgun; authorized.

An individual may obtain a permit to carry a concealed handgun in accordance with the Concealed Handgun Permit Act.

SourceLaws 2006, LB 454, ยง 2.
